long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Colors text on webpages with a gradient to make it easier to read.

Features:
- Different color scheme for dark and light mode websites
- Automatic detection of light and dark mode webpages
- Customizable colors
- Simple user interface
- No tracking
- Open source (https://github.com/beep-beep-beep-boop/mothreader)
